news.title: Iran may 'lash out harder' as Khamenei's death puts Tehran on a war footing, leaving the world bracing for what's next
news.summary: Analysts say neither Russia nor China is in a position to offer meaningful support. Iran's strategic allies Russia and China have made strong diplomatic protests.

news.title: $100 oil? Prolonged Hormuz closure could spark a 1970s-style energy shock
news.summary: U.S. strikes on Iran reignited fears of disruptions in the Strait of Hormuz. Energy analysts are bracing for a possible oil supply shock.

news.title: Iran after Khamenei: What's next and what it means for the country?
news.summary: Khamenei assumed power following the death of Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini in 1989. He inheriting a revolutionary state still consolidating itself.

news.title: All the highlights from Berkshire CEO Abel's first shareholder letter
news.summary: New Berkshire Hathaway CEO Greg Abel emphasizes he won't be making major changes to the way the company has operated for decades under Warren Buffett's leadership.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these dividend stocks for enhanced returns
news.summary: TipRanks names three stocks with dividends that analysts believe can bolster investors' portfolios. TipRanks: Three stocks with dividend payouts that can bolster portfolios.

news.title: Here’s how much you could pay for a gallon of gas by May because of the attacks on Iran
news.summary: U.S.-Israel strikes against Iran will push up oil futures, and prices at the pump, GasBuddy forecasts. The U.S. and Israel are planning to strike Iran's oil facilities.

news.title: Investors should brace for more than a brief military campaign in Iran
news.summary: U.S. President Trump said Saturday that Iran’s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was killed by U.S.-Israel strikes.

news.title: Drone warfare could mean investors need a new guidebook for this Iran conflict
news.summary: Use of ‘shoot and scoot’ drone warfare could prolong Iran conflict, warns Papic at BCA Research. ‘Shooting and scooting’ is a term used to refer to the use of drone warfare by U.S. forces.

news.title: My wife’s credit-card payment is three months overdue. As an authorized user, am I in trouble?
news.summary: “All correspondence regarding the account was sent to my wife’s email,” he said. “All of the emails were sent to her.”

news.title: Will the bank get suspicious if I deposit $150,000 in cash into my checking account?
news.summary: “I live in a state with no inheritance tax. I assume I can make this deposit legally,” he says. “I assume I will be able to make it legally.”
